titleStmt.title: The lavvfulnes of obeying the present government· Proposed by one that loves all Presbyterian lovers of truth and peace, and is of their communion.
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: for John Wright, at the Kings Head in the Old Bailey,
